outline:
1. division, course, class, share, allotment
    1. division, part
    2. division, class, course
      1. of priests, Levites (technical term of organisation)
kjv_def: company, course, division, portion. See also H5555 (סֶלַע הַמַּחְלְקוֹת).
strongs_def: a section (of Levites, people or soldiers)
